name: db-to-express-rest
description: A module to create REST API routes on an [Express](http://expressjs.com) app automagically from MongoDB or NeDB database collections.

scripts.publishdocs: cp README.md docs/index.md && git commit docs/ -m 'Updated docs/' && git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages

author: osk <oskosk@gmail.com> (http://olopez.com.ar/)
